where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ product_definition_relationship . name = 'design object addition' ) ) ) = 1

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ product_definition_relationship . name = 'design object addition' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( aa <* USEDIN ( SELF \ action_assignment . assigned_action , 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'ACTION_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ACTION' ) | 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'CHANGE_TO_DESIGN_OBJECT_ASSIGNMENT' IN TYPEOF ( aa ) ) ) >= 1

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( 'ELECTRONIC_ASSEMBLY_INTERCONNECT_AND_PACKAGING_DESIGN.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( it \ product_definition_relationship . name = 'design object deletion' ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ approval_assignment . assigned_approval . status . name in [ 'approved' , 'not yet approved' ]
